code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{database,ref,onValue}from"./firebase";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[rankings,setRankings]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const rankingsRef=ref(database,"Rankings");onValue(rankingsRef,snapshot=>{const data=snapshot.val();const formattedData=Object.values(data).sort((a,b)=>b.Score-a.Score);setRankings(formattedData);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title",children:"\uD50C\uB808\uC774\uC5B4 \uC21C\uC704"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"ranking-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\uC21C\uC704"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\uC0AC\uC6A9\uC790 \uC774\uB984"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\uC810\uC218"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\uB4F1\uB85D \uC2DC\uAC04"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:rankings.map((rank,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:index+1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:rank.UserName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:rank.Score}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:new Date(rank.TimeStamp).toLocaleString("ko-KR")})]},rank.ID))})]})]});}export default App;
